sub_topic: Study of electronic transport properties in a graphene sheet
message_1: What is the electrical conductivity of a monolayer graphene sheet at room temperature?
message_2: The electrical conductivity of a monolayer graphene sheet at room temperature is typically around 10^8 S/m (Siemens per meter). However, this value can vary depending on the quality of the graphene sheet, the presence of impurities, and other factors.
